amendment.description: Amendment sought to provide $500,000 to the Nuclear Waste Technical Review Board in order to hold hearings, take testimony, and receive evidence relating to the transportation of radioactive waste and spent nuclear fuel.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to require a review of high-level radioactive waste disposal routes.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Berkley amendment (A009) Failed by recorded vote: 102 - 321 (Roll no. 204).
